name: check-citi-bike-availability
title: Check Citi Bike Availability
description: Check the availability of bikes/e-bikes at CitiBike NYC stations.
author: kcole93

commands.name: check
commands.title: Check Citi Bikes
commands.description: Check the current availability of Citi Bikes by station.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
